item.title: Getting started with amazon-cloudformation
item.description: Getting Started # Detailed instructions on getting amazon-cloudformation set up or installed. Amazon cloud formation templates can be launched in three ways. AWS Console. AWS CLI. AWS SDK available in Java, Ruby etc.. AWS CLI is one of the most intuitive CLI available. The commands are simple to execute. To get started, the Getting Started with AWS CLI doc will be helpful.
